alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington County through 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Lincoln, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Prairie Grove... Lincoln... Greenland... Prairie Grove Battlefield State... Walnut Grove... Clyde... Canehill... Hogeye... Viney Grove... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
